exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="LevelIconSkin" width="77" height="77" currentState="up" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" states="up,down,disabled" >
	<e:Image source="gs_select_1_png" includeIn="up,down" x="0" width="77" height="77"/>
	<e:Image source="gs_select_dis_png" includeIn="disabled" x="0" y="0" width="77" height="77"/>
	<e:Label id="lb_level" text="0" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0.5" textColor.up="0xf9f7f7" size.up="30"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="LevelSkin" width="760" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Scroller id="level_group" width="760" height="1136" x="0" y="0">
		<e:Group id="group_levels" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
		</e:Group>
	</e:Scroller>
	<e:Button id="btn_back" label="" x="594" y="1014" width="94" height="73">
		<e:skinName>
		<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="BackBtn_png" source.down="BackBtn1_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="SceneBeginSkin" width="720" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="GameBG1_jpg" x="0" y="0" anchorOffsetX="-0.23" anchorOffsetY="-0.28" height="1136" width="720"/>
	<e:Button id="btn_begin" label="" x="166" y="1000.28">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="StartBtn_png" source.down="StartBtn1_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="WordSkin" width="80" height="80" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Rect ellipseWidth="20" fillColor="0xFFFFFF" strokeColor="0x0276D0" strokeWeight="4" ellipseHeight="20" right="0" left="0" bottom="0" top="0"/>
    <e:Label id="lb_text" text="å­—" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" textColor="0x000000" size="60"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="SceneGameSkin" width="720" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="GameBG3_jpg" x="0" y="0" width="720" height="1136"/>
	<e:Image source="WordFrame_png" width="580" anchorOffsetY="0" height="726" horizontalCenter="1" verticalCenter="-63"/>
	<e:Group id="group_answer" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0" verticalCenter="-77.5" height="69.33" x="196" width="329.34">
		<ns1:AnswerWord width="70" height="70" skinName="WordSkin" x="0" y="0"/>
		<ns1:AnswerWord width="70" height="70" x="86" y="0" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<ns1:AnswerWord width="70" height="70" x="172.32" y="0" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<ns1:AnswerWord width="70" height="70" x="258.51" y="0" skinName="WordSkin"/>
		<e:layout>
			<e:TileLayout orientation="rows" horizontalGap="16"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="group_words" width="515" height="379" horizontalCenter="1.5" verticalCenter="243.5" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
		<ns1:Word width="70" height="70" skinName="WordSkin" x="-101" y="-598" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<ns1:Word width="70" height="70" skinName="WordSkin" x="-91" y="-588" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<ns1:Word width="70" height="70" skinName="WordSkin" x="-81" y="-578" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<ns1:Word width="70" height="70" skinName="WordSkin" x="-71" y="-568" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<ns1:Word width="70" height="70" skinName="WordSkin" x="-61" y="-558" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<ns1:Word width="70" height="70" skinName="WordSkin" x="-51" y="-548" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<ns1:Word width="70" height="70" skinName="WordSkin" x="-41" y="-538" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<ns1:Word width="70" height="70" skinName="WordSkin" x="-31" y="-528" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<ns1:Word width="70" height="70" skinName="WordSkin" x="-21" y="-518" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<ns1:Word width="70" height="70" skinName="WordSkin" x="-11" y="-508" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<ns1:Word width="70" height="70" skinName="WordSkin" x="-1" y="-498" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<ns1:Word width="70" height="70" skinName="WordSkin" x="9" y="-488" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<ns1:Word width="70" height="70" skinName="WordSkin" x="19" y="-478" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<ns1:Word width="70" height="70" skinName="WordSkin" x="29" y="-468" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<ns1:Word width="70" height="70" skinName="WordSkin" x="39" y="-458" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<ns1:Word width="70" height="70" skinName="WordSkin" x="49" y="-448" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<ns1:Word width="70" height="70" skinName="WordSkin" x="59" y="-438" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<ns1:Word width="70" height="70" skinName="WordSkin" x="69" y="-428" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<ns1:Word width="70" height="70" skinName="WordSkin" x="79" y="-418" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<ns1:Word width="70" height="70" skinName="WordSkin" x="89" y="-408" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:layout>
			<e:TileLayout horizontalGap="41" verticalGap="32" orientation="rows"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image id="img_question" width="390" height="260" horizontalCenter="1" y="176"/>
	<e:Button id="btn_back" label="" x="40" y="12.33" width="96" height="73">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="BackBtn_png" source.down="BackBtn1_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>
